document.full_text: u.s. and pakistani authorities disagree sharply over claims that senior al qaeda leader ilyas kashmiri was killed in a recent missile strike, officials from both countries said on monday, suggesting sharp strains persist between authorities in washington and islamabad.
document.title: u.s., pakistan authorities dispute militant's death
lines_and_colors: u.s. and pakistani authorities disagree sharply over claims that senior al qaeda leader ilyas kashmiri was killed in a recent missile strike, officials from both countries said on monday, suggesting sharp strains persist between authorities in washington and islamabad.
